about_the_game:
You can listen to the BGM from 'A new beginning of a dream' and the theme songs containing the individuality of each character.
Enjoy this exciting and romantic story through the vivid and rich melodies used as backgrounds of this story and special theme songs of the characters.

[Guide]

This is a DLC that can be purchased while possessing the main game.
The OST can be played in the game.

A new beginning of a dream OST

01. Full of sunlight
02. Memories
03. The breeze of spring
04. Spending Time Together
05. Dream story - Chungwoon(CV : Kim Sangbaek)
06. Coloring - Chaeyoon(CV : Choi Jihun)
07. Pit-a-pat - Chaeyoon, Chungwoon(CV : Choi Jihun, Kim Sangbaek)
08. Promise - Chaeyoon(CV : Choi Jihun)
09. Friend - Chungwoon(CV : Kim Sangbaek)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: You can listen to the BGM from 'A new beginning of a dream' and the theme songs containing the individuality of each character. This is a DLC that can be purchased while possessing the main game. The OST can be played in the game.
supported_languages:
Korean*, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
